member.name: T:Sitecore.Social.Client.Api.AccountClientManager
member.summary: Defines the methods that are used to work with a social network account.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Client.Api.AccountClientManager.BeginGetAccountCredentials(Sitecore.Social.Client.Domain.Requests.GetAccountCredentialsRequest)
member.summary: Initializes the process of receiving the social network account credentials.

item.description: Use to receive the account credentials response by this request id.
Use to receive the exception information in a case of error.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Client.Api.AccountClientManager.EndGetAccountCredentials(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the account credentials by request id.
member.remarks: This method helps you to complete the process of receiving account credentials. At the end of the flow you'll be redirected to the with the parameter in a query string. Use this request id to receive the account credentials response.
member.param: The request id returned in the query string at the end of the flow.

member.summary: Completes authentication process.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Client.Api.ConnectorClientManager.LogOnUser(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Logs the user in the specified network. If the user account doesn’t exist, it will be created.
member.param: The URL, where the user will be redirected after login.

example.remarks: Example of how to start the login process.
Example of how to finish the login process.

member.remarks: At the end of the flow you'll be redirected to the same page again. Use to get the exception information in a case of error.

member.param: if set to true [attach account to logged in user].
if set to true [is asynchronous profile update].
The additional parameters, which were kept during the authentication flow.
member.exception: User already has another attached account of the same network.

member.summary: Determines whether social profile should be refreshed.

member.summary: Updates the full name of the user.

member.name: M:Sitecore.Social.Client.Api.ConnectorClientManager.ProcessUser(System.String,System.String,Sitecore.Social.Domain.Model.ApplicationCredentials,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Initiates the process of logging in/attaching the current user.
member.param: The URL, where the user will be redirected after login.
if set to true [update social profile async].
if set to true a social profile will be attached to the current user; otherwise, the current user will be logged in first.
The additional parameters, which will be kept during the authentication flow.
